abstract: It was a short but glorious week for the stock market, with both the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index closing on Friday at record highs.
snippet: It was a short but glorious week for the stock market, with both the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index closing on Friday at record highs.
lead_paragraph: It was a short but glorious week for the stock market, with both the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index closing on Friday at record highs.

headline.main: Dow and S.& P. End the Week at Record Highs
headline.print_headline: Dow and S.& P. End the Week at Record Highs
